column2: learned  Counsel for  the  Appellant  had  raised  following  grounds  of  appeal  for

the 
trial  Court  fallen 
into  error  when  it  considered 
the  defence  of
accident raised by the Appellant by imposition of a burden on him,
the  trial  Court  erroneously  convicted  the  Appellant  on  its  failure  to
consider the overall burden of proof,
the trial  Court failed  to consider  the  lesser culpability of the  Appellant
on the basis of cumulative provocation.
